preTitle: One platform is all you need
title: Build your digital branch to be secure, fast, and scalable
subtitle: Get routing, hosting, security, switching, and enhanced application visibility—all in a single, trustworthy platform—with Cisco 4000 Series Integrated Services Routers (ISRs).
description: Enjoy better threat protection and application visibility while you save time with streamlined network management.

benefits.title: Improve application visibility
benefits.description: Extend your visibility across the internet, cloud, and Software as a Service (SaaS). Pinpoint application issues and get actionable insights with Cisco ThousandEyes integration on select ISR 4000 Series models.

benefits.title: Easily deploy network services
benefits.description: Deploy key integrated network services for your branch in minutes—virtually or on-premises—without sacrificing performance.

benefits.title: Simplify network management
benefits.description: Simplify network automation and reduce hours of work to minutes. Configure and monitor your network to enforce business policies through Cisco Catalyst Center and Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN.

benefits.title: Boost threat protection
benefits.description: Eliminate the need for a separate security appliance. Protect your branch site across your LAN, WAN, and in the cloud with security integrated into the router.

title: Security and performance you can rely on
subtitle: Combine advanced security and cloud access in a powerful, compact device that's easy to set up and manage with secure broadband, Metro Ethernet, and wireless LAN connectivity.
description: Meet today's evolving security and network challenges with the capabilities that you need.

benefits.title: Modernize your connections
benefits.description: Get improved mobility and next-generation WAN and LAN options. Access Ethernet, DSL, 5G, and 802.11ax Wi-Fi. The 1000 Series is ideal for use as customer premises equipment (CPE).

benefits.title: Automate for success
benefits.description: Use a simple, centralized dashboard to easily control your network and cloud connections. Streamline setup and management of the 1000 Series with Cisco Catalyst SD-WAN Manager.

benefits.title: Enjoy enterprise-class security
benefits.description: Protect your network with advanced threat defense. Get fast, secure connections with encryption, VPN, firewall, and web filtering.

benefits.title: Optimize your multicloud setup
benefits.description: Cisco 1000 Series ISRs are the first fixed-configuration routers with the trusted Cisco IOS XE Software optimized for cloud connectivity, greater visibility, and full-stack security, with robust multicloud capabilities.

preTitle: Cisco ASR 9000 Series Aggregation Services Routers
title: Get routers built to serve highly demanding edge markets
description: Meet the needs of mass-scale networks with a platform that grows with you.

benefits.title: Power your mass-scale network
benefits.description: Build a network that grows as you do with the high-density, high-performance Cisco ASR 9000. Get support for 1G up to 400G and coherent optics and give your operators a solution that scales ahead of demand.

benefits.title: Get protection from inside out
benefits.description: Enjoy security and privacy throughout your journey with our secure development lifecycle. Keep everything safe and sound with Secure Boot, Cisco Trust Anchor, and anti-counterfeit measures.

benefits.title: Focus on sustainability
benefits.description: Reduce power by up to 96% per Gbps with a custom ASIC built to optimize performance with a capacity increase of 100x.

benefits.title: Explore flexible licensing
benefits.description: Build a network that’s ready for future growth. With flexible pay-as-you-grow options and dynamic license pooling, you can simplify capacity planning and scale to meet demand.

preTitle: Cisco ASR 1000 Series Aggregation Services Routers

subtitle: Experience the reliability and performance of Cisco ASR 1000 Series routers, equipped with industry-leading technology in silicon, throughput, and security to keep your business thriving.
description: Connect your business to the cloud edge reliably with ASR 1000 platforms. Improve performance and flexibility when you power your enterprise with Cisco Catalyst software-defined WAN (SD-WAN) compatibility.

benefits.title: See into your applications
benefits.description: Extend your visibility across the internet, the cloud, and software as a service (SaaS). Pinpoint application issues and gain actionable insights with Cisco ThousandEyes integration.

benefits.title: Secure with integrity
benefits.description: Leading encryption performance, layered security services, and a tamper-resistant design help ASR 1000 routers reduce your attack surface and secure edge traffic.

benefits.title: Create always-on architecture
benefits.description: Boost performance with our unique chipset architecture that splits control and data plane operations so even the busiest edges run better. With routers built to scale, your network can grow as you do.

benefits.title: Keep up with advanced silicon
benefits.description: Deliver consistent edge performance with our latest application-specific integrated circuit (ASIC) technology. Even during heavy bursts of connectivity, your network stays reliable and responsive.

benefits.title: Enjoy a smaller size

preTitle: Cisco Attack Surface Management (formerly Cisco Secure Cloud Insights)
title: Get faster hybrid cloud visibility and protection
subtitle: Improve security monitoring and cut emerging threats on your attack surface by including exposure management concepts into asset discovery and relationship-mapping with ongoing visibility.
description: To protect against threats, organizations require network visibility and control and the capacity to respond swiftly. Cisco Attack Surface Management identifies weak points in near real-time enabling rapid response.

benefits.title: Fully examine your attack surface
benefits.description: Relationship mapping makes it possible to reduce risks and meet compliance. With 100 predefined API integrations, you can examine everything in your environment and secure your attack surface.

benefits.title: Manage compliance and vulnerabilities
benefits.description: Manage compliance and security posture by monitoring relationships between hybrid IT and multiple clouds. Choose from over 800 premade queries, or customize your own, to find security gaps and misconfigurations.

benefits.title: Get a unified view of assets
benefits.description: Cisco Attack Surface Management, a Cisco XDR component, can provide a broad inventory of all entities and current security risks to identify and remediate misconfigured cloud environments and asset vulnerabilities.

benefits.title: Baseline behavior with Secure Cloud Analytics
benefits.description: Secure digital environments by combining situational awareness of Secure Cloud Analytics with structural awareness of Cisco Attack Surface Management for visibility of vulnerabilities and anomaly-based threat vectors.

title: Wireless network management made easy
subtitle: Get ultra-reliable, super-secure wireless controllers that are IoT-ready and built for Wi-Fi 6/6E and beyond.
description: Enjoy seamless network management and deployment choice: on-premises, in the cloud, or both.

benefits.title: Maximize uptime and availability
benefits.description: When deploying network updates, there's no need to go offline.

benefits.title: A truly secure solution
benefits.description: Be prepared for the unexpected with secure boot, runtime defenses, image signing, and more.

benefits.title: A healthier network
benefits.description: The Cisco Catalyst Center platform provides deep analytics and insights that help you improve performance and avoid issues.

benefits.title: Your network's full potential, realized
benefits.description: Unveil insights and network visibility with cutting-edge, programmable AI and automation software.

content.title: 6-slot modular chassis
content.content: C9606R. Modular core for resilience at scale, plus comprehensive security. 25.6 Tbps switching capacity, 6.4 Tbps per slot supporting 400G to 10G multigigabit.

content.title: 6.4 Tbps/slot supervisor, 400G QSFP-DD
content.content: C9600X-SUP-2. Made for secure and highly available high-speed campus core deployments. Based on Cisco Silicone One Q200 ASIC, supports up to 6.4 Tbps per slot, up to 400G QSFP-DD, and 50G SFP56.

content.title: 2.4 Tbps/slot supervisor, 100G/25G
content.content: C9600-SUP-1. Designed to reimagine connections, reinforce security, and redefine the hybrid workplace. Based on Cisco UADP 3.0 ASIC, supports up to 2.4 Tbps per slot, up to 100G QSFP28, and 25G SFP28.

content.title: 30-port 100G/40G QSFP28 with 400G/200G/100G QSFP-DD fiber
content.content: C9600X-LC-32CD. High-density fiber line cards for campus core. 30-port 100G/40G (QSFP28) and 2-port 400G/200G/100G (QSFP-DD). Up to 128 ports, non-blocking. C9600X-SUP-2 only.

content.title: 56-port 50G/25G/10G SFP56 with 100G QSFP28 fiber
content.content: C9600X-LC-56YL4C. High-density fiber line cards for campus core and distribution. 56-port 50G/25G/10G (SFP56) and 4-port 100G (QSFP28). Up to 240 ports, non-blocking. C9600X-SUP-2 only.

content.title: 40-port 50G/25G/10G SFP56 with 400G QSFP-DD, 200G QSFP56 fiber
content.content: C9600-LC-40YL4CD. High-density fiber line cards for campus core and distribution. 40-port 50G/25G/10G (SFP56) and 2-port 400G (QSFP-DD) and 2-port 200G (QSFP56) with C9600X-SUP-2. 40-port 25G/10G (SFP28) and 2-port 100G/40G (QSFP28) with C9600-SUP-1.

content.title: 24-port 100G/40G QSFP56 fiber
content.content: C9600-LC-24C. Higher-density fiber line cards for evolving campus core. 24-port 100G/40G (QSFP28) with C9600X-SUP-2. 24-port 40G (QSFP+) or 12-port 100G (QSFP28) with C9600-SUP-1.

content.title: 48-port 50G/25G/10G SFP56 fiber
content.content: C9600-LC-48YL. High-density 50G/25G fiber line cards for campus core and distribution. 48-port 50G/25G/10G (SFP56) with C9600X-SUP-2. 48-port 25G/10G/1G (SFP56) with C9600-SUP-1.

content.title: 48-port 10G multigigabit copper
content.content: C9600-LC-48TX. High-density copper line cards for campus distribution. Built for secure Wi-Fi 6/6E and high-speed access. 48-port 10G with C9600X-SUP-2. 48-port 10G/5G/2.5G/1G multigigabit with C9600-SUP-1.

content.title: 48-port 1G SFP fiber
content.content: C9600-LC-48S. High-density 1G (SFP) fiber line cards for campus distribution. C9600-SUP-1 only.
